articles.title: Fifty Thousand People In The Stadium Shouted 'ABD, ABD': Virat Kohli On AB de Villiers Being Cheered At Wankhede Stadium - Cricket Addictor

articles.content: AB de Villiers enjoys amazing fandom in India despite being a South African cricket player. This was because of his association with the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) in the Indian Premier League… [+2508 chars]
